h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
img_above_text:
# The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
## Lower Pagoda (Level 2)

Back at the top of the stairs to the second level, head along the outside path to the right this time. The first open cell as you head this direction will have a green Wisp to absorb to replenish some of your gourd's healing charges.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the second level of the Lower Pagoda in the "Pagoda Realm," as described in the walkthrough document titled *The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm*. A character, armed with a staff, is navigating a dimly lit, reddish environment with intricate wall designs resembling coiled patterns. On the right, a glowing purple circular symbol is visible on a barred gate, suggesting a magical or interactive element. This area appears to be part of the outside path described in the preceding text, where players explore cells and encounter resources like the green Wisp to replenish healing charges. The image likely serves to illustrate the atmospheric and gameplay elements of this section.
